name: hijri-to-gregorian
title: Hijri Converter
description: Convert dates between Hijri (Islamic) and Gregorian calendars. Features bidirectional conversion, today's date view, and MenuBar quick access with Arabic support.
author: adel_enazi

commands.name: convert-date
commands.title: Hijri → Gregorian
commands.description: Convert Hijri date to Gregorian with live preview

commands.name: gregorian-to-hijri
commands.title: Gregorian → Hijri
commands.description: Convert Gregorian date to Hijri with live preview

commands.name: show-today
commands.title: Today's Date
commands.description: Display today's date in both calendars

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Hijri Menu Bar
commands.description: Always-visible Hijri date in menu bar

commands.name: hijri-calendar
commands.title: Hijri Calendar
commands.description: View upcoming days in the Hijri calendar
